info.name: localhost:8000 (Moki-Assignment)
info.description:
This is the documentation of the back-end assignment of LMS Tool. All routes and its corresponding HTTP methods are tested and there response are stored as examples.

These examples includes the details that are necessary for a resquest.

Created by Moki :-)
